Articles.Content: I've seen alot of good works and comments on this here forums. How do I rep?

Look at below my sig.

See that star on the bottom left? That's the rep thingy.
I meant how do you give people rep.

And I told you how to.

EDIT: Wait, you mean like, taking some rep points from your profile and give it to another? I don't think that's possible.

> 
> And I told you how to.
> EDIT: Wait, you mean like, taking some rep points from your profile and give it to another? I don't think that's possible.

Alright dude, you can stop. How do I give people REP, like when you get that notification that you got rep from somebody, like when you make a good craft and someone REPS you. Thats really what I mean.

**HOW TO** **REP**

![uQSBiy5.png](http://i.imgur.com/uQSBiy5.png)

1. Click the star below someone's post.

2. Fill the comment thingy, or don't if you don't want to leave any comments.

3. Click "ADD TO REPUTATION"

4. There you go, you just gave REP to someone.
